product.title: Conair Instant Heat Hot Curl Brush, .75"
product.description: Hair Dryers / Heat Brush - Heat Brush 3/4" Instant
product.description_html: Hair Dryers / Heat Brush - Heat Brush 3/4" Instant
product.description_full:
Hair Dryers / Heat Brush - Heat Brush 3/4" Instant For the best in convenience and safety, the Conair heat hot brush features a cool tip and a tangle-free swivel cord. It also has an electronic touchpad control and is designed to rest on a counter. The Conair Instant 3/4" Hot Brush comes with dual voltage so you can take it with you on international trips.
Conair Instant Heat 3/4" Hot Brush:

 * For all hair types
 * Instant heat 60-second heat up
 * Auto shutoff
 * Tangle-free ball-tipped bristles
 * Patented Euro design nonslip grip handle
 * 25 temperature control settings
 * Dual voltage
 * Ready to use, on/off indicator light
 * Electronic touchpad control
 * Cool tip
 * Conair heat hot brush with tangle-free swivel cord
product.description_full_html:
Hair Dryers / Heat Brush - Heat Brush 3/4" Instant

For the best in convenience and safety, the Conair heat hot brush features a cool tip and a tangle-free swivel cord. It also has an electronic touchpad control and is designed to rest on a counter. The Conair Instant 3/4" Hot Brush comes with dual voltage so you can take it with you on international trips.
Conair Instant Heat 3/4" Hot Brush:

  • For all hair types

  • Auto shutoff
  • Tangle-free ball-tipped bristles
  • Patented Euro design nonslip grip handle

protection_plans.title: Walmart Protection Plan - 2-Year Plan
protection_plans.description: Protect it today, enjoy it for years. Get award-winning Allstate service and support that goes above and beyond the manufacturer’s warranty. Health & beauty plans cover: Mechanical & electrical failures Breakdowns or failures during normal use Fast repairs & replacements with easy online claims available 24/7Includes 100% parts & labor with no hidden fees When you add your new health & beauty item to cart, be sure to add a Walmart Protection Plan, too. Simply add your plan at checkout. There’s no need to register your plan for it to be active. We’ll email you protection plan details after you check out.
